name: Paradox (itch) (Rafael Endo)
description:
A small concept game made for Kennyjam 2018.

The idea is to create paradox (or clone yourself) and try to solve nine simple levels. This game may content bugs, please report when see.

Controls

LEFT - LEFT ARROW
RIGHT - RIGHT ARROW
JUMP - SPACEBAR
CREATE A PARADOX - Z
REWIND - X
RESET LEVEL - R
